Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Great food wow! Went for dinner and we were blown away by truly delicious food and friendly service. Steak Bearnaise was amazing, Risotto was great. Pity I didn‚Äôt have space for desert! Maybe a bit cold in the back corners but hardly noticeable.

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Visited here while on holiday with my girlfriend. Lovely food, friendly staff and a really nice vibe to the place. We liked it so much that we went back for brunch 3 times!

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Tasty burgers and breakfast for a decent price. Very friendly English-speaking service and comfortable atmosphere. A nice hidden spot in the city centre with nearly no noisy tourist. Highly recommendable!

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text:
Arrived at the place just searching for an espresso - however then had to try the carrot and coconut cake.
Delicious! ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text:
Service is approximative and slow (the bill was wrong, needed to order water 3 times and only got it at the end of the meal, food got prepared fast but waited more than 10 minutes to be served to us and arrived cold)
Food is ok but nothing exceptional

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Staff was very friendly and service was prompt. A serene and ideal place to enjoy a relaxed lunch while wandering the city. The food was delicious and well-presented, and there were many options on the menu.

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Really yummy food and great coffee. We had a great time here and the staff were very friendly and professional

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Lovely place! Delicious food and so friendly service, love it!

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Good place for lunch and the service is very good. Worth checking out the city archive and associated shop whilst you're here - it's a great place to buy interesting Amsterdam-themed gifts with no tourist tat. Think books about Amsterdam artists, coffee table photo books, etchings etc.

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: We were in Amsterdam from Thursday to Sunday and went here for breakfast every day !! Mexican breakfast , eggs benidict, yoghurt with granola and a tuna melt  were all delicious. Staff are so friendly and there is such a lovely atmosphere

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Waffles were simple but amazing, good beer too.

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Service was great! Super friendly people, then the food came... A-MAZ-ING! Creative but also classic sandwiches and the red lentil soup is a must! Really recommend this for a good and affordable breakfast.

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Came in for Lunch today, well organized menu with a variety of dishes. I had the eggs benedict and my friend had the Blonde Aquitaine Beef burger both were absolutely fantastic! We will be back!!

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Great food, lovely service, reasonable prices! The staff is really friendly and kind, so absolutely recommended! Definitely worth it!

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Excellent place for food. Very reasonably priced also. Chicken soup and steak bearnaise was very good.

Name: Cafe de Bazel
Review Text: Lovely place, great personnel and cook! Highly recommend.

Review Text: Food was not good, and very expensive
